notes: Weekly. Began with vol. I, no. 1 (Nov. 13, 1885); ceased with vol. 14, no. 10 (Dec. 22, 1898). -- Vol. 1, no. 1-11, Oct. 13-Dec. 22, 1898 include section titled: The Vedette.
